<a id="Joint3D"></a>

# Joint3D

**Inherits:** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [ConeTwistJoint3D](ConeTwistJoint3D.md), [Generic6DOFJoint3D](Generic6DOFJoint3D.md), [HingeJoint3D](HingeJoint3D.md), [PinJoint3D](PinJoint3D.md), [SliderJoint3D](SliderJoint3D.md)

Abstract base class for all 3D physics joints.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstract base class for all joints in 3D physics. 3D joints bind together two physics bodies ([node_a](Joint3D.md#Joint3D_property_node_a) and [node_b](Joint3D.md#Joint3D_property_node_b)) and apply a constraint. If only one body is defined, it is attached to a fixed [StaticBody3D](StaticBody3D.md) without collision shapes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [3D Truck Town Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2752)

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Joint3D_property_exclude_nodes_from_collision"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **exclude_nodes_from_collision** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#Joint3D_property_exclude_nodes_from_collision)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_exclude_nodes_from_collision**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_exclude_nodes_from_collision**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the two bodies bound together do not collide with each other.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Joint3D_property_node_a"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **node_a** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#Joint3D_property_node_a)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_node_a**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_node_a**\ (\ )

Path to the first node (A) attached to the joint. The node must inherit [PhysicsBody3D](PhysicsBody3D.md).

If left empty and [node_b](Joint3D.md#Joint3D_property_node_b) is set, the body is attached to a fixed [StaticBody3D](StaticBody3D.md) without collision shapes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Joint3D_property_node_b"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[NodePath](NodePath.md) **node_b** = `NodePath("")` [ðŸ”—](#Joint3D_property_node_b)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_node_b**\ (\ value\: [NodePath](NodePath.md)\ )
- [NodePath](NodePath.md) **get_node_b**\ (\ )

Path to the second node (B) attached to the joint. The node must inherit [PhysicsBody3D](PhysicsBody3D.md).

If left empty and [node_a](Joint3D.md#Joint3D_property_node_a) is set, the body is attached to a fixed [StaticBody3D](StaticBody3D.md) without collision shapes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Joint3D_property_solver_priority"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **solver_priority** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#Joint3D_property_solver_priority)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_solver_priority**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_solver_priority**\ (\ )

The priority used to define which solver is executed first for multiple joints. The lower the value, the higher the priority.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Method Descriptions

<a id="Joint3D_method_get_rid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **get_rid**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Joint3D_method_get_rid)

Returns the joint's internal [RID](RID.md) from the [PhysicsServer3D](PhysicsServer3D.md).
